name: Press X To Launch
description:
Steer a rocket around the earth. If the asteroids are annoying: Fly faster!

Control your ship with left and right. Press X To Launch!

Fullscreen recommended!

How it fits the theme:

  • Picking up fuel  resets your speed and increases your top speed
  • Hitting debris causes different effects based on your speed
  • Fuel is lost over time

Art, music and programming by Schrunkin. Made with PICO-8.
